mapper.select: select * from (select a.c_info_num, b.p_info_num, b.uniq_id_num, b.music_cat_code, c.music_cat_small, d.u_info from class_info a left join prof_info b on a.P_INFO_NUM = b.p_info_num left join music_cat c on b.music_cat_code=c.music_cat_code left join member d on b.uniq_id_num=d.uniq_id_num) where c_info_num=#{c_info_num}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT B.C_OPEN_DATE,C.C_TITLE, C.P_INFO_NUM FROM CLASS_CONFIRM A LEFT JOIN CLASS_OPEN B ON A.C_OPEN_NUM = B.C_OPEN_NUM LEFT JOIN CLASS_INFO C ON B.C_INFO_NUM = C.C_INFO_NUM) A WHERE A.P_INFO_NUM=(SELECT P_INFO_NUM FROM CLASS_INFO WHERE C_INFO_NUM =#{c_info_num})

SELECT C_OPEN_NUM, C_INFO_NUM, C_OPEN_DATE, C_OPEN_TIME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE C_OPEN_NUM=A.C_OPEN_NUM) AS PAYMENTS FROM CLASS_OPEN A WHERE C_OPEN_DATE>SYSDATE+2 AND C_INFO_NUM=#{c_info_num} ORDER BY C_OPEN_DATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.REVIEW_CONTENT, D.P_INFO_NUM FROM CLASS_REVIEW A LEFT JOIN PAYMENT B ON A.PAY_NUM = B.PAY_NUM LEFT JOIN CLASS_OPEN C ON B.C_OPEN_NUM=C.C_OPEN_NUM LEFT JOIN CLASS_INFO D ON C.C_INFO_NUM=D.C_INFO_NUM) WHERE P_INFO_NUM=(SELECT P_INFO_NUM FROM CLASS_INFO WHERE C_INFO_NUM=#{c_info_num})

SELECT A.REVIEW_NUM,A.PAY_NUM,A.REVIEW_CONTENT, A.REVIEW_STAR,A.REVIEW_WRT_DATE,B.UNIQ_ID_NUM,D.C_INFO_NUM ,(SELECT U_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE UNIQ_ID_NUM=B.UNIQ_ID_NUM) AS U_NAME ,(SELECT U_PHOTO FROM MEMBER WHERE UNIQ_ID_NUM=B.UNIQ_ID_NUM) AS U_PHOTO FROM CLASS_REVIEW A LEFT JOIN PAYMENT B ON A.PAY_NUM = B.PAY_NUM LEFT JOIN CLASS_OPEN C ON B.C_OPEN_NUM=C.C_OPEN_NUM LEFT JOIN CLASS_INFO D ON C.C_INFO_NUM=D.C_INFO_NUM WHERE D.C_INFO_NUM=#{c_info_num} ORDER BY A.REVIEW_NUM
SELECT CV_NAME FROM CV_SELECTED A LEFT JOIN CV B ON A.CV_CODE=B.CV_CODE WHERE C_INFO_NUM=#{c_info_num}
SELECT C.U_PHOTO FROM CLASS_INFO A LEFT JOIN PROF_INFO B ON A.P_INFO_NUM = B.P_INFO_NUM LEFT JOIN MEMBER C ON B.UNIQ_ID_NUM = C.UNIQ_ID_NUM WHERE C_INFO_NUM=#{c_info_num}
SELECT (SELECT STARAVG FROM PROF_VIEW WHERE UNIQ_ID_NUM=B.UNIQ_ID_NUM) AS STARAVG FROM CLASS_INFO A LEFT JOIN PROF_INFO B ON A.P_INFO_NUM = B.P_INFO_NUM WHERE A.C_INFO_NUM=#{c_info_num}

SELECT A.C_QA_NUM,A.C_QA_CONTENT,A.C_QA_WRT_DATE,B.P_ANSW_CONTENT,B.P_ANSW_WRT_DATE,B.P_ANSW_NUM,A.UNIQ_ID_NUM ,(SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM USER_UNIQUE_ID WHERE UNIQ_ID_NUM=A.UNIQ_ID_NUM )AS USER_NICKNAME ,(SELECT U_PHOTO FROM MEMBER WHERE UNIQ_ID_NUM=A.UNIQ_ID_NUM) AS U_PHOTO FROM CLASS_QA A LEFT JOIN PROF_ANSWER B ON A.C_QA_NUM = B.C_QA_NUM WHERE A.C_INFO_NUM=#{c_info_num} ORDER BY A.C_QA_NUM
